props.name: reOffsetsAndBlur
props.desc: Regex matching shadow offsetX, offsetY and blur (ex: "2px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)", "rgb(0,255,0) 2px 2px")

props.name: affectStroke
props.desc: Whether the shadow should affect stroke operations

props.name: includeDefaultValues
props.desc: Indicates whether toObject should include default values

props.name: nonScaling
props.desc: When `false`, the shadow will scale with the object. When `true`, the shadow's offsetX, offsetY, and blur will not be affected by the object's scale. default to false

props.name: toObject
props.desc: Returns object representation of a shadow

props.name: toString
props.desc: Returns a string representation of an instance

props.name: toSVG
props.desc: Returns SVG representation of a shadow
